import"./Browse.css";import axios from'axios';import{useEffect}from'react';import Video from'./Video';import{useContext}from'react';import{WorkoutContext}from'./WorkoutContext.js';import Navigation from'./Navigation.js';//Component for the Browse section
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Browse(){const{exerciseContainers,setExerciseContainers}=useContext(WorkoutContext);const{exerciseSearch,setExerciseSearch}=useContext(WorkoutContext);useEffect(()=>{if(exerciseContainers.length==0){axios.get("http://localhost:5000/exercises",{withCredentials:true}).then(response=>{setExerciseContainers(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching data:",error);});}},[]);const handleSearch=newVal=>{setExerciseSearch(newVal);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"browse-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Exercise Browser"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"searchBar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search",onChange:e=>handleSearch(e.target.value),value:exerciseSearch})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"searchResults",children:exerciseContainers.filter(item=>{const search=exerciseSearch.toLowerCase();const currExercise=item._id.toLowerCase();return currExercise.startsWith(search);}).map(currExercise=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"childContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:currExercise['_id']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Video,{vidId:currExercise.video}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Primary Muscle: ",currExercise.primaryMuscle]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Secondary Muscles: ",currExercise.secondaryMuscles]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Equipment: ",currExercise.equipment]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Level: ",currExercise.level]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Type: ",currExercise.type]})]},currExercise['_id']))})]});}export default Browse;
